TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PreviewKeyDownEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the use of this type. In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event. This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ComboBox>. Then name the instance `Control1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreviewKeyDown> event.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#65)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#65](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#65)]
